participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and determined, she is excited yet slightly overwhelmed with the upcoming challenges of motherhood.
participant_1.background: a already have a step children. i recently moved to this country. i just moved into my first home. i am expecting triplets in three months.

participant_2.background: i am interested in photography and like taking pictures. i'm fluent in english spanish and french. i am an elementary school teacher. my favorite colors are red and silver. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week.
